items.longDescription:
Pokémon Meets Artist SS22

Since its creation in 1996, Pokémon has been loved by people worldwide. This collection features the participation of “magma,” a new artist duo attracting attention worldwide. Their creativity has produced a collection full of new Pokémon charm and appeal!

artist unit: magma
An artist unit by Jun Sugiyama and Kenichi Miyazawa. They use their unique outlook to create works with waste materials, resin, and motor appliances, and have expanded into furniture, products, and space direction. They are garnering much attention both domestically and abroad for their vaguely nostalgic works that fuse analogue and crazy colors.

©2022 Pokémon.
©1995-2022 Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc.
items.name: Pokemon UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Pokémon as art! A new Pokémon collection created through an encounter with art is coming to UT!

items.longDescription:
Andy Warhol / Jean-Michel Basquiat / Keith Haring

Andy Warhol, Basquiat and Keith Haring laid the foundations of the pop art world. It is a collection using their popular masterpieces that still do not fade.

Andy Warhol

As the preeminent American artist of the 20th Century, Andy Warhol challenged the world to see art differently. This product is produced under a license from The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc., a New York not-for-profit corporation which promotes the visual arts.

©/®/™ The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc.
Brillo™ is a registered trademark of the Armaly Sponge Company. All rights reserved.
items.name: Andy Warhol UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Andy Warhol, Jean-Michel Basquiat, and Keith Haring's iconic works on UT.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Andy Warhol / Jean-Michel Basquiat / Keith Haring

Andy Warhol, Basquiat and Keith Haring laid the foundations of the pop art world. It is a collection using their popular masterpieces that still do not fade.

Keith Haring

A key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,” with abstract marks and patterning.

© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
items.name: Keith Haring UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Andy Warhol, Jean-Michel Basquiat, and Keith Haring's iconic works on UT.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- 100% rayon fabric with an elegant drape.
- Roomy fit in the shoulders and sleeves.
- Featuring water and wave patterns from woodblock prints by early twentieth-century artist and designer Kamisaka Sekka.
- Kamisaka Sekka is considered the last great master of the Rinpa school of Japanese painting, which sought to find beauty in everyday life.
- A relaxed Aloha shirt.
- From our collaboration with Unsodo, a publisher of traditional Japanese books made with hand-printed woodblock prints since the 19th century.
- According to some sources, the first Aloha shirts were made by migrants from Japan to Hawaii who remade old kimono into shirts.
- This genuine Japanese print is a perfect match with the Aloha shirt.

items.longDescription:
- Jointly developed with raw materials from the world renowned denim manufacturer Kaihara Corporation, these are UNIQLO Jeans most flexible jeans with a 40% stretch rate and an 80% recovery rate.
- The weft has a special polyester yarn preventing kickback, making it harder for the knee to wear out, so it's perfect for a skinny cut.
- It's a smooth and comfortable cut that`s been tapered around the ankles
- Stretch around the waist and a straight cut offers stress-free comfort.
- A secure feel with two waistbelts to support your hips.
- The back pocket has been moved higher to further highlight the wearer`s legs.
- A proprietary and unique distressing process, developed by the Jean Innovation Center's cutting-edge technology and jean-processing specialists, creates a timeworn, authentic look and feel.
- A sophisticated look is created through relaxed color stitching and flat and clean looking matte buttons.

- Updated for a more relaxed, casual fit.
- Front snaps are easy to operate with one hand.
- Practical 5-pocket design features patch pockets with plenty of storage at the waist, patch and zippered chest pockets, and interior pockets.
- Pairs well with casual or outdoor styles.
items.name: Utility Parka
items.shortDescription: Practical design with multiple interior and exterior pockets. A convenient parka for leisure or daily wear.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
From a collaboration with our Fast Retailing sister brand, Theory.

- Stretchy, lightweight, and quick-drying fabric, jointly developed with Toray Industries.
- Excellent stretch for easy movement.
- Stay fresh and comfortable even on hot days.
- This convenient light jacket slips on like a shirt.
- Boxy fit with a laid-back feel.
- Part of our Kando series.
- Easy to mix and match with any outfit.
- Unisex design.
items.name: Ultra Light Shirt Jacket
items.shortDescription: Our incredibly comfortable shirt jacket. A versatile outer layer for any day of the week.

Timeless essentials, remixed.

- Our unique fabric jointly developed with Toray.
- 100% polyester fabric with a natural feel.

items.name: MARNI Tailored Jacket
items.shortDescription: MARNI’s take on a UNIQLO favorite. Perfect for a casual style. Purchase Limit: 1 piece per item per person.*Purchases for resale are strictly prohibited.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
From a collaboration with our Fast Retailing sister brand, Theory.

- Stretchy, lightweight, and quick-drying fabric, jointly developed with Toray Industries.
- Excellent stretch for easy movement.
- Stay fresh and comfortable even on hot days.
- Relaxed cut with slightly dropped shoulders and a roomy fit at the waist.
- Zippered side pockets.
- The zippers on the side pockets are designed to blend in to the seams.
- The buttons have a matte finish on the front and a smooth finish on the back, making them easy to grip.
- Interior pockets on both sides for extra storage.
- This versatile styling piece styles on its own or paired with the matching bottoms.
items.name: Ultra Light Jacket
items.shortDescription: Our incredibly comfortable shirt jacket. A versatile outer layer for any day of the week.
